_header: He that is king of all lands
Note:
See Walther (1969)
XWalther, Hans. Initia carmina ac versuum medii aevi posterioris latinorum. Göttingen, 1959; 2nd ed. 1969, no. 16778.
Subjects: Christ, body of; translations; Last Supper
_description: ‘Corpus Christi’ — one quatrain (abab) translating ‘Rex sedet in mensa turba cinctus duodena’ which is written to its left in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
He þat is king of alle londisAt soper sith among hem
                    tuelueHimself hat betuixen is hondisHe is þat mete þat
                    fetȝ himselue
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 12.
